links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Peter Vaughan''' ([[4 April]] [[1923]] - [[6 December]] [[2016]]) voiced the part of [[Denethor|Denethor II]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' 1981 radio series]] broadcasted on the BBC 4.
